biography: Henry Hills has made more than 30 experimental films and videos since 1975. He divides his time between New York, Vienna, & Porter Springs, GA. He is Visiting Professor at FAMU, the film academy in Prague; was a 2009 Guggenheim Fellow; and his work is in the permanent collection of the Museum of Modern Art.  SELECTED FILMS 1977-2008 is available on DVD from Tzadik.
name: Henry Hills
